name: East Bay Community Law Center - Immigration
description: Free immigration legal representation for low-income Alameda County residents
fullDescription: East Bay Community Law Center provides free immigration legal services to low-income immigrants in Alameda County, including representation and community education.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free immigration legal consultations
- Representation in immigration court
- Asylum application assistance
- Family-based petitions
- Naturalization and citizenship
- Community education workshops
howToGetIt:
1. Call EBCLC intake line
2. Complete screening for services
3. Must be low-income Alameda County resident
4. Attend appointment with immigration attorney
5. Receive representation or referrals
